Chaos gremlin. Science rants, crying about space explo, SFF reading and writing, c-media (c-dramas, webnovels and adaptations, Street Dance of China, Super Vocal, traditional 中国文化 YouTubers), a revolving blend of adventures in cooking, knitting, spinning, gardening, wearable electronics, skateboarding, kayaking, birdwatching. Licensed ham, research data librarian, occasional Linux admin, HSK 2 Mandarin, conversational Russian, some French, limited Hindi.
